entry.title: Watermelon Taffy - Hand & Body Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Lotion
Price: 15.00

Juicy watermelon, tart lemon and lime blended with white musk and vanilla leave you with the smell of Watermelon Salt Taffy in the air and your skin.

Green Tea Extract, Aloe Vera and Shea Butter form the base of our Hand & Body Lotion.  Thinner than our Body Butter, this lotion leaves a hydrated, non greasy feel, great for warmer months and as an after sun lotion.  Strong enough for full body but light enough to be used as a face moisturizer as well.  96% Natural.

9.25 oz bottle.

Test on skin before use, may contain allergens.​

​Ingredients: Deionized Water, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Emulsifying Wax NF, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Camellia Sinensis (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol and Caprylyl Glycol (Optiphen®).

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Gift Card
Price: 10.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Topher's Beard + Soap Co. gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: Muscle Butter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Lotion
Price: 10.00 - 18.00 (2 variants)

 

The Arnica plant has been used for years to reduce swelling and for pain management.  Hot and cold compresses have been used as well.  We've combined all the above into one easy to apply gel.

We infused arnica plant extract, menthol and select essential oils into a non greasy, fast absorbing gel base.  

Waves of hot and cold from the menthol, cinnamon and black pepper essential oils offer relief from muscle strains and pain.  The arnica extract helps to reduce localized swelling which can also offer relief. 

Massage a small dab of gel into effected area.  

Caution: Do NOT wrap.  External use only.  Avoid eyes and sensitive membranes.

2.3 oz / 64 g bottle or 4.5 / 128 g bottle.

Test on skin before use, may contain allergens.​

​Ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua, Menthol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Propylene Glycol (and) Diazolidinyl Urea (and) Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Carbomer FD20, Tetrasodium EDTA, Arnica montana (Arnica flower) extract, Cinnamomum burmanni (Cinnamon) Bark Oil, Piper nigrum (pepper) seed oil, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil.
